CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Chromium
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.label: chromium
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.description: Chromium is a hard, lustrous metal renowned for its brilliant shine and outstanding resistance to tarnish. It enhances the durability and appearance of alloys and is often used to create sleek, modern finishes.
